user.title: Configure CAP Alerts
user.description: Set up CAP (Common Alerting Protocol) alerts integration

data_description.feed_url: URL of the CAP (Common Alerting Protocol) XML feed to monitor for alerts
data_description.area_filter: Filter alerts by area name or geocode. Matches against areaDesc and geocode tags in the CAP XML. Leave empty to receive all alerts.
data_description.language_filter: Filter alerts by language code (e.g., 'en', 'cs', 'cs-CZ'). Leave empty to receive alerts in all languages.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to check for new alerts, in seconds

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the CAP feed

abort.already_configured: This CAP feed is already configured
